title: Beautiful Porter Square (Somerville) 3 Bedroom
posting_body: ['For the most up to date information, visit: <URL>', 'RCG LLC 617-625-8315', '<URL>', 'Rent Directly From RCG and Pay No Fee!', 'This is for an apartment rental.', 'RCG does not rent by the room.', 'VIRTUAL TOUR: https://kuula.co/share/collection/7qtKv?logo=0&info=0&fs=1&vr=1&sd=1&initload=0&thumbs=1', 'Available for lease beginning 9/1/22.', '  Improvements: The following will be completed prior to 9/1/22 move-in:  Apartment will be fully painted, and updates will be made to track lighting fixtures in hallway and kitchen.', 'In the bathroom, medicine cabinet will be updated, bath tile and tub will be re-glazed in white, and a bath vent fan will be installed.', '  Owner is willing to complete additional improvements if new tenants can delay move-in or accommodate after move-in.', 'Please reach out for more details.', '  Ideally located 3BR apartment with large eat-in-kitchen, spacious living room, and bonus fully enclosed three season porch!', ' Features include hardwood floors, in-unit laundry, large bedrooms with high ceilings, loads of natural sunlight, and much more.', '   This property is located steps to the many shops, restaurants, and the Red Line T in Porter Square.', '87 and 83 bus at the end of the block.', '  No dogs.', 'Keys at RCG.', 'Must provide 24 hour notice.', '26nv4tk9v6twq1t']
